name: Ext_R5_Goal_outcome
title: Cross-version Extension for R5.Goal.outcome for use in FHIR R4B
description: This cross-version extension represents Goal.outcome from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/Goal|5.0.0 for use in FHIR R4B.

element.short: What result was achieved regarding the goal?
element.definition: Identifies the change (or lack of change) at the point when the status of the goal is assessed.
element.comment: `Goal.outcome` maps to R4B `Goal.outcomeCode`. Has no type mapping So is mapped as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget. `Goal.outcome` maps to R4B `Goal.outcomeReference`. Has no type mapping So is mapped as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget.

element.short: What result was achieved regarding the goal?
element.definition: Identifies the change (or lack of change) at the point when the status of the goal is assessed.
element.comment: `Goal.outcome` maps to R4B `Goal.outcomeCode`. Has no type mapping So is mapped as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget. `Goal.outcome` maps to R4B `Goal.outcomeReference`. Has no type mapping So is mapped as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget.

binding.description: The result of the goal; e.g. "25% increase in shoulder mobility", "Anxiety reduced to moderate levels".  "15 kg weight loss sustained over 6 months".
